pages.title: Diary 4/12 845
pages.text: I have traveled all over the world,The world presents peace and beauty , Until I found a $(9)substance$() that threatened the existence of the world.$(br)  I used to think things from $(9)The End$() are the most stable product in the world.But I found ... you may not believe it ,$(l:goldens_additions:important_items/eroded_ender_pear) a eroded ender pear $(). A force of terror seems to wanna devour me when I picked it up.

pages.title: Diary 4/12 845
pages.text: Later, I racked my brains trying to explore this power . But there is a voice in my mind telling me: $(br)  $(#f00)DONNOT TOUCH TAHT!$() $(br)  I ignored that voice,I must find out what $(3)that power$() is.
